A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A fantastic addition the the series! Mark Hamill delivers his best performance to date a Luke Skywalker. Rian Johnson handles balancing a variety of plotlines with thought and care. Each character is given a progressive story arch that leaves them in some unique and interesting places. Questions that we thought would not be answered receive surprising and unexpected revelations that redefine our heroes' journeys. Absolutely a must-see film\, and an instant classic!
